title: WTB: last T207 - Donnelly, Boston Nat'l
author: frohme

posts.post_title: WTB: last T207 - Donnelly, Boston Nat'l
posts.post_content:
Still looking for one last T207 ... Donnelly - Boston Nat'l.  At this point, any grade would do, just to fill the hole.

If you've got one you'd consider parting with, I will make it worth your while, $$, trade, or both.

Have some trade material - mostly pre-war Pirates stuff and other T207 an a smattering of other older material.  Pretty much everything from the trade/sale page (link below) as well as albums other than the T207 set at my [URL="http://imageevent.com/gspinf"]ImageEvent site[/URL] would be fair game for this.

[URL="mikefrohme@yahoo.com"]Send me an email[/URL] if you have any interest, and thanks for looking.  
--
Mike

Been almost 3 months - a bump to see if anyone can help out.

Thanks.
--
Mike
